login.welcomeMessage: Submit your credentials to access the IoT platform
login.unavailable: The backend is unavailable or too slow. Please try again later.
login.twoFactorMessage-AUTHENTICATOR: Enter your Authenticator code to continue
login.twoFactorMessage-SMS: Enter your SMS code to continue
login.twoFactorMessage-EMAIL: Enter your Email code to continue
login.eulaAcceptMessage: A new version of the terms of use for this service is available, before accessing it, you must accept them. The following link allows you to consult them.
login.eulaAcceptSwitch: By activating this switch, I accept the new terms of use
login.passwordExpired: Your password has expired, please change it to continue.
login.passwordSize: Password must be at least 8 characters long
login.passwordLostMessage: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link
login.passwordLostMessageSent: An email has been sent with instructions to reset your password, this email is only valid for a few minutes, if you don't find it, please check your spam folder. You can close this page.
login.emailSize: Email address must be at least 4 characters long
login.title: Connection
login.user-registration-received: Registration request received, please check your email to confirm your registration
login.user-creation-missing-password: Password is mandatory for account creation
login.user-creation-password-rules-matching: Password does not match the rules
login.user-profile-password-not-valid: User password does not respect the formating rules
login.user-profile-key-not-valid: User password reset key is not valid
login.user-profile-key-not-found: User password reset key not found or expired
login.user-upgrade-brute-force: Brute force attack detected, please wait
login.user-profile-2fa-sms-not-supported: 2FA method SMS is not yet supported
login.user-profile-condition-not-found: Admin did not setup the user conditions
login.user-profile-customfields-upserted: User profile's custom fields have been updated
login.user-profile-encryption-error: Technical error during user profile encryption, modification nos saved
login.user-profile-language-invalid: User profile language is not valid
login.backendTimeout: The backend did not respond within the expected time. Please try again later.
login.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

users.registerMessage: To register, please provide your email address.
users.registerMessCode: If you have been given an invitation code, please enter it; otherwise, leave the field blank.
users.registerMessCodeMust: You have been given an invitation code, please enter it.
users.registerWithEmail: An email will be sent to you to confirm your address. It is valid for a limited time. If you do not find it within 5 minutes, please check your spam folder.
users.registerAdminValid: Finally, an administrator will manually validate your registration. You will receive a confirmation email once your account is activated.
users.registeredMessage: Your registration request has been received, please follow the next steps, you will soon be able to log in.
users.verificationKeyMissing: The verification key is missing, invalid address.
users.creationMessage: To create your account, please create your password.
users.creationMessageCond: Please also accept the terms of use of the service. You can consult them
users.successRedirectMessage: You will be shortly redirected to the login page.
users.passwordChangeSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.

tools.toasterDisconnectedMessage: The backend is unavailable or too slow. Please try again later.

profile.gen_description: This information helps us better personalize your experience.
profile.gen_emailDesc: Your email address cannot be changed.
profile.gen_firstNameDesc: Your first name is used to personalize communications.
profile.gen_lastNameDesc: Your last name is used to personalize communications.
profile.gen_mobileNumberDesc: Your mobile number is used for two-factor verification.
profile.gen_languageDesc: The language of the user interface.
profile.error_notLoggedIn: You are not logged in, please log in to access your profile.
profile.gen_saveSuccess: Your profile has been successfully updated.
profile.gen_saveError: An error occurred while updating your profile.
profile.gen_invalidPhoneNumber: The entered phone number is not valid.
profile.sec_description: Manage your security settings, including password changes and two-factor authentication.
profile.sec_savePassSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.
profile.sec_saveSuccess: Your settings have been saved successfully.
profile.sec_2faDesc: Configure two-factor authentication to enhance the security of your account.
profile.sec_change2FASuccess: Your two-factor authentication settings have been successfully updated. Please verify the configuration before leaving this session, otherwise you may not be able to log in again.
profile.sec_2fa_verify: To use two-factor authentication, you need to scan this QR code with your Google Authenticator app and we recommend verifying a first code. If you cannot do this, it is better to disable two-factor authentication or choose a mode such as email.
profile.sec_2fa_verifyinput: Enter the verification code generated by your authentication app.
profile.sec_verify2FASuccess: The two-factor authentication verification was successful. You can now use your account with two-factor authentication enabled.
profile.sec_verify2FAFailed: The two-factor authentication verification failed. Please try again and if it fails, disable two-factor authentication.
profile.signout: An error occurred while signing out, please try again.
profile.signoutError: The session could not be closed and the tokens were not deleted, please try again.
profile.danger_description: This section allows you to delete your user account and perform other critical operations.
profile.danger_deactivationDesc: You can deactivate your account. This is a logical deletion that prevents any access to your encrypted personal data on our platform. If you deactivate your account, it will not be destroyed: existing links with groups or objects will be preserved, allowing ongoing shares to remain active. A request to the administrators, followed by signing back into your account, will restore your access. After a defined period, your account will be permanently deleted. Upon deactivation, you will be logged out and your API keys as well as your sessions will be removed.
profile.danger_deletionDesc: It is possible to permanently delete your account. This operation will delete your account, your groups, and your associated data. This operation does not offer any possible rollback.
profile.danger_loginRef: Please keep this identifier, which will be the only way to identify you later: {login}
profile.rights_description: This section displays the roles and rights that have been assigned to you by the platform administrators.
profile.rights_roleDesc: Roles represent the operations you have access to.
profile.rights_groupDesc: Groups represent the sets of objects you have access to.

useradm.purgatoryDesc: List of disabled users, you can restore or permanently delete them.
useradm.searchDesc: Allows you to search for a user to perform actions such as account closure, 2FA reset ... The search requires at least 3 characters and does not cover the entire email or users whose personal data is obfuscated.
useradm.lastRegisterDesc: List of users who have registered recently.
useradm.updateUserDesc: Modification of a user's configuration and associated rights.

Purgatory.purgeConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the user? This action is irreversible.

SearchUser.actionConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to perform this action that will have a destructive effect on the user's data?

RecentReg.actionConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to perform this action that will have a destructive effect on the user's data?

GroupsForm.noGroupAvailable: No group is available, abnormal situation, please contact an administrator.

groups.createDesc: A group allows you to group devices, manage access rights, and associate common behaviors such as alerts. Groups are hierarchical, and a group can contain sub-groups. A person with rights on a higher-level group will automatically obtain rights on the associated sub-groups.
groups.name: Name of the group
groups.nameDesc: The name of the group is free and will be visible when the group is shared, it can be changed during delegation with restricted rights.
groups.descriptionDesc: The description provides additional information about the group, it will be visible when the group is shared.
groups.gen_createError: An error occurred while creating the group
groups.groups-not-all-found: Not all the requested groups were found, result truncated
groups.groups-generate-shortid-too-many-retry: Failed to create a new group, too many shortId already used
groups.groups-invalid-user-request: Group action rejected due to invalid user
groups.groups-creation-with-parentid-set: Impossible to create a root group with a parentId set
groups.groups-group-creation-success: The requested group has been created
groups.groups-group-creation-right-refused: You are not authorized to create a such group

common.backendTimeout: The backend did not respond within the expected time. Please try again later.
common.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
